title: Refrigerator Vertical Mullion Rail - Black
description: Refrigerator Vertical Mullion Rail - Black ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 18 Reviews PartSelect Number PS11738596 Manufacturer Part Number WP12722803B Commonly referred to as the flapper assembly, the door mullion is an important part of a double, or triple door refrigerator.

installationInstructions.author: Don from Alpine, TX
installationInstructions.title: Broken Rail-Mullin
installationInstructions.content: The mullin requires only one screw removal, then LIFT the entire mullin upwards. Pop the wire harness loose, and replace with new mullin. Simple job,
